parameters.name: CredentialConfig
parameters.description: The authorization chain settings. For more information, see [Use authorization chains to access resources of other entities](~~465340~~).

parameters.name: Interval
parameters.description: The interval of capturing video frames. Unit: seconds. Valid values: 1 to 600. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: MaxFrames
parameters.description: The maximum number of frames that can be captured from the video. Valid values: 5 to 3600. Default value: 200.

parameters.name: Notification
parameters.description: The notification settings. For information about the asynchronous notification format, see [Asynchronous message examples](~~2743997~~).

parameters.name: SourceURI
parameters.description:
The OSS URI of the video.

Specify the OSS URI in the oss://${Bucket}/${Object} format, where `${Bucket}` is the name of the bucket in the same region as the current project and `${Object}` is the path of the object with the extension included.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The custom tags. The custom tags help you retrieve the task.

parameters.name: UserData
parameters.description: The custom information, which is returned in an asynchronous notification and facilitates notification management. The maximum length of the value is 2,048 bytes.
